trans-unit.source: The DsmlRequestDocument class enables you to build a DSML request payload, such as <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest"></xref>, <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest"></xref>, or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DsmlRequestDocument permite-lhe criar um payload de pedido DSML, tais como <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest"> </xref>, <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest"> </xref>, ou <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: It contains zero or more <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> derived objects.
trans-unit.target: Contém zero ou mais <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> derivada objetos.

trans-unit.source: The user may add, delete, modify, and enumerate the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> before sending to the server.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode adicionar, eliminar, modificar e enumerar o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> antes de enviar para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: DsmlRequestDocument can be used with any DSML Binding classes to transport the document, such as <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: DsmlRequestDocument pode ser utilizada com quaisquer classes DSML enlace para o transporte o documento, tais como <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DsmlRequestDocument constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de DsmlRequestDocument cria uma instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty request document.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria um documento de pedido vazio.

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O método Add adiciona um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> o objeto a adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection at which the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object was added.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> coleção à qual o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: request is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: requesté uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all items from this collection.
trans-unit.target: O método Clear remove todos os itens desta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method determines whether this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection contains the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O método contém determina se este <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> coleção contém especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object for which to search.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto que pretende procurar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object is part of the collection; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto faz parte da coleção; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method copies the entire <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: O método CopyTo copia toda a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> coleção a uma matriz unidimensional, que começa no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz unidimensional que é o destino dos elementos copiada a partir de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `value` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do `value` onde copiar começa.

trans-unit.source: The Count property contains the number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade contagem contém o número de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objetos nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objetos nesta coleção.

trans-unit.target: A propriedade DocumentProcessing contém um dos valores de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"> </xref> que especifica a forma como os elementos da coleção são processados.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"></xref> that specifies how the elements of the collection are processed.

trans-unit.target: valueé um valor de enumeração inválido.

trans-unit.source: The SyncRoot property contains an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SyncRoot contém um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar acesso para o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide synchronized versions of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> using the SyncRoot property.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas podem fornecer versões sincronizadas a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>utilizando a propriedade SyncRoot.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the SyncRoot of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>, not directly on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O código de sincronização tem de efetuar operações em SyncRoot do <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>, não diretamente no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: Isto assegura um funcionamento correto de coleções que são derivadas de outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, mantém sincronização adequada com outros threads que podem ser simultaneamente modificar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>

trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar acesso para o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref>.
